Feature Notes:
Ancestry Feats: 1 selections
Animal Accomplice: Has the Familiar feature
Fighter Feats: 1 selections
Fighter Key Attribute: 1 selection
Gnome Heritage: 1 selection
Gnome Obsession: +2 Skill Feat (Additional Lore; Assurance)
Umbral Gnome: Has the Darkvision feature
Wellspring Gnome: 1 selection
Chameleon Gnome: Can use a 1 hr process to change skin and hair colors
Darkvision: Has normal b/w vision in darkness and dim light
Familiar: May have a familiar
Fey-Touched Gnome: Has the Fey trait
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Perception: +6 (wisdom; expert)

Acrobatics: +1 (dexterity; untrained) Diplomacy: +2 (charisma; untrained) Scribing Lore: +4 (intelligence; trained)

Skill Notes:
Armor Skill Penalty: -2 strength and dexterity skills
Fighter Skills: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from Acrobatics, Athletics; Choose 4 from any)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +1 Language Count
Animal Elocutionist: Can speak with animals and gains +1 to Make An Impression on them
Chameleon Gnome: (1) Gains +2 Stealth until surroundings change
Fey Fellowship: +2 Perception (fey)/May make an immediate -5 Diplomacy check to Make An Impression on fey and retry a failure after 1 min conversation
Illusion Sense: +1 Perception (illusions)
Sensate Gnome: Has 30' imprecise scent; can use it to gain +2 Perception to locate a creature
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Combat
Hit Points: 20 Armor Class: 18 (dexterity (1 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 16 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: Breastplate Shield: Tower (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Light Pick (+5 1d4 P [Crit d8]; strength; expert); Longspear (+5 1d8 P; strength; expert); Shield Boss (+5 1d6 B; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +3
Gnome Weapon Familiarity: Weapon Familiarity (Gnome Weapons; Glaive; Kukri)
Exacting Strike: (1) Strike does not count toward multiple attack penalty on failure
Gnome Weapon Familiarity: Has access to kukris and uncommon gnome weapons
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Vivacious Conduit: 10 min rest restores 1 HP
Save: Fortitude: +7 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +8 (dexterity; expert); Will: +4 (wisdom; trained)
Save Notes:
Fey Fellowship: +2 vs. fey
Illusion Sense: +1 Will vs. illusions/R10' Automatically attempts checks to disbelieve illusions
Magic
Attack: Arcane Innate: +5 (charisma; trained); Occult Innate: +5 (charisma; trained); Primal Innate: +5 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Arcane Innate: 15 (charisma; trained); Occult Innate: 15 (charisma; trained); Primal Innate: 15 (charisma; trained)
Spells:
Disguise Magic (O1): (1 min) Alters the magical aura of the target object, making it appear as non-magical, as a common magical item of up to twice the spell level, or as under the effects of a spell of up to the spell level, until next daily prep (heightened 2nd can affect a creature or all of its possessions)
Interplanar Teleport (P1): (2) TODO
Invisibility (P1): (2) TODO
Revealing Light (P1): (2) TODO
Silence (O1): (2) TODO
Magic Notes:
Cautious Curiosity (Occult): Knows the Disguise Magic and Silence occult innate spells; can cast each at 2nd-rank on self once per day
First World Adept: Knows the Invisibility and Revealing Light primal innate spells; can cast each once per day
Homeward Bound: Knows the Interplanar Teleport primal innate spell; may use it twice per week to travel to the First World
Energized Font: (1) Regains 1 Focus Point once per day
Fey-Touched Gnome: Can cast a chosen primal cantrip as an innate spell at will; may spend 10 min to choose a different cantrip once per day
First World Magic: Can cast a chosen primal cantrip as an innate spell at will
Instinctive Obfuscation: (R) Illusory double forces a successful DC 10 flat check on an attacking foe once per hour; failure negates the attack
Life Leap: (1) Passes through an adjacent creature to the opposite side
Project Persona: (1) Places an illusion of normal clothing over armor
Razzle-Dazzle: Inflicted blinded or dazzled conditions last 1 additional rd
Wellspring Gnome (Arcane): Can cast a chosen arcane cantrip as an innate spell at will
